extendedInfo.description: Calc and Graph - Scientific calculator with easy usage, ability to plot function and touch features (expression editing, long tap second function of button, plot navigation).Features:- all expression (function) in one line- complex numbers support- second button with long tap on display- simple expression editing- undo/redo function- plot functions and derivative of functions- simple plot navigation with touch features- save plot images- local function extrema, intersections- binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal numeric systems- matrices up to 10x10 with matrix functions like jordan-gauss elimination, determinant, trace, rank ...Calculator for fast and simple everyday usage.If you find error in application, please report it at burnlinesoft@gmail.comhttp://www.facebook.com/CalcAndGraph**(developers from Slovakia)**

reviews.title: Button reaction problem
reviews.comment: Great app. I have an issue though. Every button on the left, right and bottom side (save | n! | sinh | ( | 7 | 4 | 1 | 0 | . | \317\200 | e | i | = | - | / | Ans | tan | ln | ->) cannot be pressed, if you move your finger too much on the outer side. Every button except the red AC button does it -> so i think it can be fixed. Sometimes quite annoying...
reviews.author: Petr Jaklovsky

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It works well on SGS2. However, it does not work well on Galaxy Note Tab.  On the tab, I cannot get the menu option and therefore, I cannot get the graphing capability.  Plz fix that.  Thanks
reviews.author: Mohammad Khadhrawi

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Sheikh Asif

reviews.title: Great app with a few minor bugs
reviews.comment: Bugs: XNOR, NOR, NAND, NOT don\'t work (\"Overflow error\", seems it\'s the compound functions that contain NOT and NOT itself, suggesting it\'s NOT that\'s buggy), no menu button to change graph settings (there was before, have the settings moved? I checked the main settings, they\'re not there).
reviews.author: Ben Paxton

reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Good, but still needs improvement
reviews.comment: The only thing that needs improvement is the editing a number on the answer screen, to make it act more like the usual scientific calculator.

reviews.title: Above average
reviews.comment: Mostly great. It would be nice to add options for digit grouping to make large numbers more readable. More customization options for plotting graphs would be great, too. All in all, this is a good app, thank you for providing it for free.
reviews.author: Nikola Pekas

reviews.title: pcplcprogrammer
reviews.comment: Great app! Really like number base conversion. Did find a small bug though. In octal base after executing \"=\" and result displayed as i.e. 0o20, press \"AC\" then \"ANS\". The value 0o20 is put on on the edit line as 0x20 not 0o20. Octal base isn\'t used very often by most .people anymore. Sadly I still have some older 8 bit controller. Thanks for the convenient app.
reviews.author: Wallie Billingsley

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: You need to add exp physical constant button, like in scientific calculator (autor hexflashor)

reviews.title: Display options
reviews.comment: Great app! Very impressive. Would love to see more graphics options when displaying the graph. The lines come out too small on high DPI devices such as my nexus 10!
